meanings.definition: In a way that is pleasantly different or new.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream tasted refreshingly sweet.
meanings.sent2: The cool breeze was refreshingly welcome on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist in the movie was refreshingly surprising.
meanings.sent4: Her unique perspective on the topic was refreshingly refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the painting were refreshingly vivid.

meanings.definition: In a way that is pleasantly invigorating or revitalizing.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, the cold stream felt refreshingly cool.
meanings.sent2: The fresh lemonade was refreshingly tart on her tongue.
meanings.sent3: The energetic dance routine was refreshingly lively.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude was refreshingly contagious.
meanings.sent5: The morning yoga session left her feeling refreshingly rejuvenated.
